# redfox_crd (Resource)

RedFox Crd
```terraform
resource "redfox_crd" "crd" {
  metadata {
    name        = "cluster.acme.com"
    labels      = {}
    annotations = {
      "some-annotations" = "some-variable"
    }
  }
  spec {
    gvk {
      group   = "acme.com"
      version = "v1"
      kind    = "cluster"
    }
  }
}
```
